name: Flappy Things
description:
Mobile game for android. Throw them at targets and earn coins! Help uncle Bill renovate his farm after tornado disaser.  Buy new flappy things! An exciting arcade game based on physics and dexterity. Throw syringe, pencil or mic, improve your skills and feel the satisfaction of hitting the many different target!

All gameplay in Flappy Things can be earned or unlocked without paying. It’s really free to play.
